General.Name: Goody Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Goody Science and Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of plastic pipes in China. The company offers polyvinyl chloride, polyethylene, and polypropylene series pipes, which are used in municipal and building water supply; and drainage, agricultural, municipal sewage, communication power sheathing, gas transmission, radiant heating, industrial fluid transportation and other fields. In addition, it is involved in cultural tourism business related to sports events. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Ezhou, China.
